content: And I really don’t know what to say to you, dear one. Except maybe that these words here have lightened my heavy heart. The stuff I’m dragging around in a knapsack on my back is big, big stuff. I find myself struggling to catch my breath as I search many times throughout the day. I search to find the confidence I need to know I’m doing good things in the world. Next time I’m looking, I’ll start my search here. That way it won’t take so long to find and I’ll be able to breathe without gasping. You can’t possibly know. I needed to read that I am a helper. Right now I’m trying to help stuff that seems unhelpable. But, then again, maybe the stuff is more helpable than I thought. I’d have never guessed that if it weren’t for you. So we’re square, you and me. 😎 Thank you for telling me, Paul Reney. Please be good to you. -Cyborg 🌺
